item.title: Contact
item.description: The best way to contact me is by email at conor.reynolds@mu.ie. My social links, if you can call them that, extend only as far as a GitHub account and a GitLab account. Should my mind become sufficiently fevered, my judgement sufficiently imparied—I may make a write-only Twitter account.

item.title: CV
item.description: Still working on it! In the meantime, here’s some information of questionable note. Education PhD Computer Science Maynooth University 2019–now MSc Mathematics Maynooth University 2018–2019 BSc Computational Thinking(Mathematics, CompSci, Philosophy) Maynooth University 2015–2018 Awards Hamilton Prize Mathematics Royal Irish Academy 2017 Turing Prize Computer Science Maynooth University 2017 Cook Prize Computer Science Maynooth University 2017 Delort Prize Mathematics Maynooth University 2017
